panels.description: In Babylon, each finality provider have to send a tx each block

targets.rawSql:
;  -- Order in ascending order for the last 100 blocks
WITH max_height AS (
  SELECT MAX(height) AS highest_height
  FROM babylon_finality_provider_${table_chain_id}
)
SELECT
  bfp.height,
  bfp.status,
  fpi.moniker AS moniker,
  fpi.operator_address as address,
  fpi.btc_pk as btc_pk
FROM
  babylon_finality_provider_${table_chain_id} bfp
JOIN
  meta.finality_provider_info fpi
  ON bfp.finality_provider_pk_id = fpi.id
JOIN
  max_height mh  -- Join to get the maximum block height
  ON bfp.height BETWEEN (mh.highest_height - ${blocks}) AND mh.highest_height
ORDER by
  bfp.height ASC

panels.description: In CometBFT, each validator should vote at each block

targets.rawSql:
;  -- Order in ascending order for the last 100 blocks
WITH max_height AS (
  SELECT MAX(height) AS highest_height
  FROM voteindexer_${table_chain_id}
)
SELECT
  vidx.height,
  vidx.status,
  vi.moniker AS moniker
FROM
  voteindexer_${table_chain_id} vidx
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON vidx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
JOIN
  max_height mh  -- Join to get the maximum block height
  ON vidx.height BETWEEN (mh.highest_height - ${blocks}) AND mh.highest_height
ORDER by
  vidx.height ASC

panels.title: Consensus Vote Status

panels.description: In Babylon, each validator should bote BLS voting at each epoch+1 block

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  idx.height, 
  idx.status,
  vi.moniker AS moniker,
  idx.epoch
FROM
  babylon_checkpoint_${table_chain_id} idx
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON idx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
WHERE
  idx.epoch >= (
    SELECT MAX(epoch) - (${epochs} - 1)
    FROM babylon_checkpoint_${table_chain_id}
  )
ORDER BY
  idx.epoch desc
